name: Ninja Outbreak Demo
description:
You play as a scientist in a soviet science facility on the surface of Venus. The super-soldier serum, codemane RASPUTIN, has gone horribly wrong. In addition to gaining preternatural fighting abilities and dexterity, subjects showed began showing violent tendancies. Those that they attacked began showing the same symptoms. Now there is a full blown outbreak and the station has gone into lockdown to prevent further spread.

This Demo contains the first area of the game.

You can help support the game by voting for it on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=355603149

You can follow the development of the game here: http://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=41438.0

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim/Shoot

Q - Switch Weapon

E - Interact

F - Eat ration

Space - Pause

M - Mute
